channel.title: Enabling annotate_query for Snowflake
channel.description:
Hello! We would like to annotate the queries for Snowflake (interested in user names/id/whatever particularly), as it is done for some databases. However Snowflake's query runner does not seem to contain any calls to annotate_query. Was it done intentionally for some reason? Otherwise, WDYT on adding this? Can I provide a PR to get it sooner? Any hints?
Best regards, Evgenii
